thread.title: How to watch Donald Trump’s rally in Melbourne, Florida
thread.title_full: How to watch Donald Trump’s rally in Melbourne, Florida

author: Jacob Gardenswartz
title: How to watch Donald Trump’s rally in Melbourne, Florida
text: Then-candidate Donald Trump waves at supporters after speaking at a campaign rally in Melbourne, Florida, in September of 2016. Photo by Jewel Samad/Getty Images After less than a month in office, President Donald Trump is back on the campaign trail. On Saturday, he will appear at a rally in Melbourne, Florida. Join me in Florida this Saturday at 5pm for a rally at the Orlando-Melbourne International Airport! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 15, 2017 The rally will take place at 5 pm EST in the AeroMod International hangar of the Orlando-Melbourne International Airport. In his chaotic, 77-minute news conference Thursday , Trump touted the event, saying he “just heard that the crowds are massive that want to be there.” On Air Force One on Friday, Trump deputy press secretary Sarah Huckabee called Saturday’s event “a campaign rally for America,” according to CNN’s Elizabeth Landers . Watch a live stream of the event here: Was this article helpful?
